      How to Wear It

      Boys' silk tie in black

      Item 04458

      Color:

      Black

      Get free shipping always with J.Crew Passport

      Size & Fit

      • 42" fits ages 2-7; 52" fits ages 8-16.

      Product Details

      A true classic, our silk tie is the perfect finishing touch for any little guy looking to get spruced up.
